name: PolyBeat
description:
In this 2D-Rhythm Game you are in control of a shape anchored to the middle of a 3x3 grid. Hit the notes appearing on the fields around you to the beat of the music to gain points and avoid touching the bomb-zones to build up the rhythm and beat the levels.

This project marries our very own, self-made beats with a beaming 80s-retro aesthetic. Get engulfed in an arcadey storm of beats, bombs, combos and do your best to keep the rhythm alive.

Team: Hocke (Lead-Programmer), Wraygo (Sound Design, Programmer), whywelose (Lead-Artist)
